overview_of_class: This is the first quarter of a two-quarter class on Electrodynamics. We will cover electrostatics and magnetostatics, induced EM fields, conservation laws, and electromagnetic waves.
name: Electrodynamics
title: WCAS PHYSICS 414-1-20 Electrodynamics

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute Building (2145 Sheridan Road), Room F-125, Evanston

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the first quarter of a two-quarter class on Electrodynamics. We will cover electrostatics and magnetostatics, induced EM fields, conservation laws, and electromagnetic waves.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: It is suggested to have taken Math methods, an undergraduate course at the level of Griffiths.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Basic electromagnetism at the graduate level; general methods of theoretical analyis in physics.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Classical Electromagnetism in a Nutshell, Anupam Garg

subject: PHYSICS
